thread.title: Wal-Mart to Cut 450 Jobs at Headquarters
thread.title_full: Wal-Mart to Cut 450 Jobs at Headquarters - WSJ

author: Sarah Nassauer
title: Wal-Mart to Cut 450 Jobs at Headquarters
text:
Wal-Mart Stores Inc. CEO Doug McMillon said 450 people will be laid off at the company’s headquarters in Bentonville, Ark., according to a memo sent to all Wal-Mart staff today.
“After months of evaluation, we’ve concluded there is an opportunity to better position our Home Office teams to move with speed and purpose,” Mr. McMillon wrote in the memo. The company is at “an important time in our history,” he said. “This in part means... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
